text: Itnay mein dono aurton mein say aik unn ki taraf sharam-o-haya say chalti hui aaee kehnay lagi kay meray baap aap ko bula rahey hain takay aap ney humaray (janwaron) ko jo pani pilaya hai uss ki ujrat den jab hazrat musa (alh-e-salam) unn kay pass phonchay aur unn say apna sara haal biyan kiya to woh kehnay lagay abb na darr tu ney zalim qom say nijat paee
